thread.title: eMoney Advisor Announces Gary Vaynerchuk as Fall Summit Keynote Speaker
thread.title_full: eMoney Advisor Announces Gary Vaynerchuk as Fall Summit Keynote Speaker

author: admin
title: eMoney Advisor Announces Gary Vaynerchuk as Fall Summit Keynote Speaker
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 11:40 AM Companies mentioned in this article: eMoney Advisor 
CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- eMoney Advisor (“eMoney”), the leading provider of advanced wealth-planning solutions for financial advisors, announces that Gary Vaynerchuk , a top mind on entrepreneurism, marketing, innovation and investing, will give the keynote address at the eMoney Advisor Summit: Become an emXpert , October 19-21 at the JW Marriott and Ritz-Carlton in Orlando, Florida. 
Vaynerchuk, who co-founded the multi-million dollar digital agency VaynerMedia and is the visionary behind WineLibrary, is known for his relentless entrepreneurial spirit, unapologetically direct style and a swagger that leaves his audience not only entertained but also inspired. His approach, both dynamic and defiant, perfectly complements eMoney’s culture and the tone set by the firm so far this year. 
At the Advisor Summit, Vaynerchuk’s sure-to-be high energy presentation will center on using technology—and new mediums for communication in particular—to set yourself apart from the competition, teaching Summit attendees how to think outside the box when it comes to connecting with clients. 
It’s a topic he knows a thing or two about. Named to both Fortune and Crain's 40 under 40 lists in consecutive years and profiled in the New York Times , Fortune , and Inc. , Vaynerchuk has almost single-handedly redefined the way businesses should use technology to build their brand and maximize growth. 
Vaynerchuk adds to the already stacked lineup of event speakers . The Summit will also feature in-depth training and networking opportunities, and give advisors the opportunity to provide feedback to the firm’s development team, preview new product features, including a game-changing prospecting tool, and ask questions directly to eMoney’s executive leadership team. 
Register Now 
Open to current clients and advisors interested in learning how eMoney’s solutions can help them remain ahead of the competition. Register at www.emoneyadvisorsummit.com . 
Thank you to our event partners : Orion Advisor Services , Abridge , Riskalyze , FMG Suite , BizEquity , Peak Advisor Alliance , Bachrach and Associates , Technology Tools for Today , Advisors Gateway , FP Transitions , HiddenLevers , Financial Planning Association , Wealthbox , Redtail , Broadridge , Brinker Capital , United Capital , FinaMetrica , Ebix , Twenty Over Ten , and Liberty Tax Service . 
About eMoney Advisor 
eMoney Advisor, LLC (“eMoney”), based in Conshohocken, Pennsylvania, is the only wealth-planning system for financial advisors that offers superior transparency, accessibility, security, and organization for everything that affects their clients’ financial lives. A technology envisioned and created by advisors for advisors, eMoney's award-winning software and resources are tailored to transform the advisor's ability to implement comprehensive financial plans and prepare their clients for a secure financial future. Visit: www.emoneyadvisor.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910006606/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
